content: mushroom chapstick minder note everything is worked in the continuous round use stitch markers as needed to keep track of where you are in the piece mushroom base magic_ring 6 slip_stitch together and pull closed 2 single_crochet in each stitch around 12 single_crochet in the back loop around 12 single_crochet around for 8 row of 12 96 single_crochet stitches slip_stitch into next stitch chain 25 or more if you want a longer loop slip_stitch into a stitch on the other side of the tube slip_stitch into 1-2 more stitches securely tie off mushroom cap magic_ring 6 slip_stitch together and loosly pull closed you want the center circle to be big enough to pull the loop of the mushroom base through 2 single_crochet in each stitch around 12 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next stitch repeat around 18 single_crochet in next 2 stitches 2 single_crochet in next stitch repeat around 24 single_crochet in next 3 stitches 2 single_crochet in next stitch repeat around 30 next 5 row single_crochet around 30 150 single_crochet stitches 2 single_crochet in every stitch around ~or~ 2 half_double_crochet stitches in the front loop around 60 slip_stitch to close and tie off pull loop of mushroom body through center hole of mushroom cap
